sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些副词均含"几乎不"之意。
means: hardly ： 指接近最低限度，差不多没有多余，强调困难和程度。
scarcely ： 指不太充分，不太够，不足，不能令人满意，强调数量。
barely ： 指仅仅够，一点不多，强调没有多余。

sentence.Network_en: His style could scarcely be further removed from that of his predecessor.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的风格几乎和他的前辈如出一辙。

sentence.Network_en: In fact he could scarcely have spent his time more profitably.
sentence.Network_cn: 事实上，他几乎已最大程度地利用了他的时间。

sentence.Network_en: It was scarcely in their interest to let too many people know.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们并不希望太多人知晓此事。

...的主题是：“为干渴的城市供水”(water for thirsty cities)；, 的主题是：“水的短缺”(water scarce)；, 的主题是：“－－看不见的资源”(ground water -- invisible resource.

means.word_mean: 好容易才,几乎,模糊地,轻微地

entry.def: You use scarcely to emphasize that something is only just true or only just the case.
You can use scarcely to say that something is not true or is not the case, in a humorous or critical way.

example.ex: Yesterday, however, his views seemed scarcely relevant...
example.tran: 然而，昨天他的观点似乎毫无关联。

entry.def: If you say scarcely had one thing happened when something else happened, you mean that the first event was followed immediately by the second.

example.ex: Scarcely had they left before soldiers arrived armed with rifles...
example.tran: 他们刚离开，扛着步枪的士兵们就到了。

example.ex: Bruce had scarcely shaken our hands when the phone rang.
example.tran: 布鲁斯刚和我们握了握手，电话就响了。

sentences.sentence: "had scarcely rung the bell when the door flew open"
"would have scarce arrived before she would have found some excuse to leave"- W.B.Yeats
"he was hardly more than sixteen years old"
"they scarcely ever used the emergency generator"

auth_sentence.content: It could, perhaps, scarcely be anything else.
auth_sentence.res_content: It could, perhaps, scarcely be anything else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It could, perhaps, scarcely be anything else.

auth_sentence.content: I've scarcely touched it so far this year.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've scarcely touched it so far this year.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've scarcely touched it so far this year.

auth_sentence.content: This Sunday, they were scarcely distinguishable from another.
auth_sentence.res_content: This Sunday, they were scarcely distinguishable from another.

sentences.en: We scarcely have time for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 我们几乎没有吃早饭的时间。

sentences.en: You can scarcely expect me to believe that.

jushi.english: I had scarcely come in when the phone rang.
There were scarcely fifty people present in that meeting.
jushi.chinese: 那次会议出席的不足50人。
